name: Taipei 101 (Taiwan) - Simplified Model
description: 504 m tall; tuned mass damper (660 tons), 8-section tower, steel moment frame
reference_sources: Sinn et al. 2004: Effective Liquid Dampers for Tuned Mass Dampers (JSCEJ)
expected_outputs: TMD response to wind/seismic excitation (damping ratio validation)
Max acceleration at top <0.1g (compare to target spec)
notes: Focus on TMD integration and damping validation; full model not required
